item.description:
Try Fun Games & Activities like the Bunny Hop, an Egg Hunt, or Duck Duck Bunny! Enter a FREE raffle to win a Pet Easter Basket. Special Treat for Pets who come dressed in their Easter Best for the Pet Parade!

Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.why: Spring is STILL hiding! I think we need to coax it out into the open with our cute little honey bunnies :) And just in time for the Easter Holiday! So after you get your palms on Sunday stop by & help us shake off winter & WAKE UP SPRING!
item.name: Celebrate Easter with your Favorite Pooch!
